publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6893 Elaine Smith: Good Luck Ricky—That the Parliament wishes the very best of luck to Coatbridge boxer Ricky Burns as he challenges for the WBO World Super Featherweight Championship at the Kelvin Hall Glasgow on Saturday 4 September 2010; recognises that he has been Commonwealth Super Featherweight champion for nearly two years and has successfully defended the title on three occasions, and hopes that he becomes Scotland’s latest world boxing champion. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, David Stewart*, Kenneth Gibson*, Mary Mulligan*, Bill Butler*, Stuart McMillan*, Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-6893 Good Luck Ricky (lodged on 1 September 2010) Brian Adam*
S3M-6893 Good Luck Ricky (lodged on 1 September 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
